data.name: GameModeArcade
data.comment: The displayed name of the "Arcade Single Player" game mode

data.name: GameModeClassic
data.comment: The displayed name of the "Classic" game mode

data.name: GameModeCTC
data.comment: The displayed name of the "Capture the Cell" game mode

data.name: GameModeDescriptionArcade
data.comment: The help text for the "Arcade Single Player" game mode

data.name: GameModeDescriptionClassic
data.comment: The help text for the "Classic" game mode

data.name: GameModeDescriptionCTC
data.value: Ein spieler mit einer riesigen Zelle gegen ein Team aus drei Spielern (4 Spieler)
data.comment: The help text for the "Capture the Cell" game mode

data.name: GameModeDescriptionDomination
data.value: Kontrolliere eine Anzahl an Zellen für eine gewisse Zeit (2-4 Spieler)
data.comment: The help text for the "Domination" game mode

data.name: GameModeDescriptionFun
data.value: Wie der Classic Modus aber mit extra Änderungen (2-4 Spieler)
data.comment: The help text for the "Fun" game mode

data.name: GameModeDescriptionLvsR
data.value: Zwei Teams mit jeweils ein oder zwei Spielern (2-4 Spieler)
data.comment: The help text for the "LvsR" game mode

data.name: GameModeDomination
data.comment: The displayed name of the "Domination" game mode

data.name: GameModeFun
data.comment: The displayed name of the "Fun" game mode

data.name: GameModeLvsR
data.comment: The displayed name of the "Left versus Right" game mode

data.comment: Text on the "Options" button in the "Main Menu"

data.name: OFF
data.comment: Displayed whenever there is something turned off

data.name: ON
data.comment: Displayed whenever there is something turned on

data.name: VERSION
data.value: Version 0.9 - Campus Days + Lange Nacht Edition (2013)
data.comment: The version string which will be displayed in the main menu.

data.name: VirusNameEbola1
data.comment: The diesplayed name of Ebola Virus

data.name: VirusNameEpsteinBarr1
data.comment: The displayed name of Epstein-Barr Virus

data.name: VirusNameH5N11
data.comment: The displayed name of Influenza Virus

data.name: VirusNameHepatitisB1
data.comment: The displayed name of Hepatitis B Virus

data.name: VirusNameHIV1
data.comment: The displayed name of HI Virus

data.name: VirusNameMarv1
data.comment: The displayed name of Marburg Virus

data.name: VirusAdditionalInfoH5N1
data.value: It is a highly contagious virus which is a potential pandemic threat.
data.comment: The info string of "Influenza"

data.name: VirusAdditionalInfoHIV
data.value: Infection with HIV occurs by the transfer of blood, semen, vaginal fluid, pre-ejaculate, or breast milk.
data.comment: The info string of "HIV"

data.name: MainMenuHighscore
data.comment: Text on the "Highscore " button in the "Main Menu"

data.name: BackToMainMenu
data.comment: Return to MainMenu Button

data.name: VirusAdditionalInfoEbola
data.value: EBOV is a select agent, World Health Organization Risk Group 4 Pathogen (requiring Biosafety Level 4-equivalent containment).
data.comment: The info string of "Ebola"

data.name: VirusAdditionalInfoEpsteinBarr
data.value: It is one of the most common viruses in humans.
data.comment: The info string of "Epstein Barr"

data.name: VirusAdditionalInfoHepatitisB
data.value: Can also lead to cirrhosis and hepatocellular carcinoma.
data.comment: The info string of "Hepatites B"

data.name: VirusAdditionalInfoMarv
data.value: MARV is another World Health Organization Risk Group 4 Pathogen.
data.comment: The info string of "Marv"

data.name: VirusCausedDiseaseEpsteinBarr
data.value: Implicated in several diseases that include infectious mononucleosis, multiple sclerosis and Hodgkin lymphoma.

data.name: VirusCausedDiseaseMarv
data.value: Marburg virus disease often called Marburg hemorrhagic fever (MHF)

data.name: VirusClassificationEbola
data.value: Group V; Genus Ebolavirus; Family of Filoviridae

data.name: VirusClassificationEpsteinBarr
data.value: Group I; Genus of Lymphocryptovirus; Family of Herpesviridae

data.name: VirusClassificationH5N1
data.value: Group V; Genus A; Family of Orthomyxoviridae

data.name: VirusClassificationHepatitisB
data.value: Group VII; Genus Orthohepadnavirus; Family of Hepadnaviridae

data.name: VirusClassificationHIV
data.value: Group VI; Genus Lentivirus; Family of Retroviridae

data.name: VirusClassificationMarv
data.value: Group V; Genus Marburgvirus; Family of Filoviridae

data.comment: The short name of Ebola Virus
